abstract: Microsoft shows off some of the online bits and bobs coming in Office 2010 as it responds to competitors pushing Internet-based productivity software.
snippet: Microsoft shows off some of the online bits and bobs coming in Office 2010 as it responds to competitors pushing Internet-based productivity software.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s saunter toward providing all of its Office software online continues this week with a preview of its Office 2010 software.

headline.main: Microsoft Office 2010 Starts Ascension to the Cloud
